Thursday 12 June

Devoxx UK

@devoxxuk
Devoxx UK @devoxxuk
06/12/2014 at 9:00 AM in 2 months 06/13/2014 at 8:00 PM

DEVOXX UK IS BACK!


____
Running June 12th & 13th, 2014, our packed schedule will include presentations and hands-on labs delivered by industry veterans, mavericks and rising stars, both UK and Internationally based.



Our program committee has done an outstanding job of curating the conference. Their dedication to ensuring only the best, interesting and hottest topics make it into the schedule shows in the impressive line-up we have for you in 2014.

Come along and enjoy awesome conference sessions, inspiring keynotes, tons of open-table Birds of a Feather sessions (BOFs), Quickies, Ignites and plenty of space to hang out with other developers. You'll also be able to check out collaborative projects you might want to get involved with.

Don’t miss out on the event that arms you, the busy developer, with real, tangible concepts and technology knowledge that will improve your work.

Sign up and join us now - before someone else grabs your place.

devoxx.co.uk
